content:
From: Anders Schlichtkrull <cl-isabelle-users@lists.cam.ac.uk>
Dear Isabelle Users List

Aalborg University Copenhagen is again looking to appoint a number of assistant professors (with possibility of tenure-track) in computer science.
Aalborg University Copenhagen is the Copenhagen campus of Aalborg University.

The deadline for applications is soon: 1 January 2023!

I work as assistant professor w/tenure track at Aalborg University Copenhagen, and I hope that someone from the Isabelle mailing list will be my new colleague! :-D

You can apply here:

https://www.stillinger.aau.dk/vis-stilling/?vacancy=1200411

Cheers,
Anders Schlichtkrull
